#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  long int n,k,t,i,x,sum;
  string s1;map<char,int> m;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--){
        cin>>s1;m.clear();
      for(i=0;i<s1.length();i++){
         if(m.find(s1[i])==m.end())m[s1[i]]=1;
         else m[s1[i]]++;
       }
      map<char,int>::iterator it;sum=0;
     for(it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++)
     {
       switch(it->first){
         case 'A':
         case 'D':
         case 'O':
         case 'P':
         case 'Q':
         case 'R':sum+=it->second;break;
         case 'B':sum+=(it->second)*2;break;
        default:break;
         }

     } cout<<sum<<endl;

  }


}
